gender.semantic_description: The gender of the student, indicating whether the student is male or female.

race/ethnicity.semantic_description: The race or ethnicity category to which the student belongs, used for demographic analysis.

parental level of education.semantic_description: The highest level of education attained by the studentâ€™s parents, indicating the educational background influencing the student.

lunch.semantic_description: Indicates whether the student receives standard or free/reduced lunch, reflecting socio-economic status.

test preparation course.semantic_description: Indicates whether the student completed a test preparation course prior to the exam.

math score.semantic_description: The score achieved by the student in the mathematics exam, measured out of 100.

reading score.semantic_description: The score achieved by the student in the reading assessment, measured out of 100.

writing score.semantic_description: The score achieved by the student in the writing assessment, measured out of 100.

students_performance.description: This table records the performance statistics of students across various demographic factors and educational background. It includes scores in math, reading, and writing, along with relevant demographic details.

database_description: This database captures the academic performance of students with respect to demographic factors such as gender, race/ethnicity, parental education level, and socio-economic status, represented by lunch type. It provides insights into how these factors correlate with achievement in standardized tests across subjects.
